rules.fullName: Billing Web Request ACH Request %28Electronic Payment%29
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =ACH Request (Electronic Payment), the WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"ACH Request (Electronic Payment)"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = AR Exception, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = AR Exception, Case Owner = Business Operations Specialists (Sales Operations)
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"AR Exception"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request AR Exception%2CTemporary collections hold
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = AR Exception Needed,Increase Credit Limit,Restore Invoicing Privileges,Submit Customer PO Form and Temporary collections hold the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = AR Exception, Case Owner = Customer Ops
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"AR Exception Needed"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Increase Credit Limit"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Restore Invoicing Privileges"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Submit Customer PO Form"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Temporary Collections Hold") ), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False)

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Account Maintenance, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type: Customer Account Maintenance, and Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Account Maintenance"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Aquatics Invoicing, the WF sets up Case Owner = Business Operations Specialists (Sales Operations)
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Aquatics Invoicing"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Bankruptcy Notice Received
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Bankruptcy Notice Received the WF sets up Case Owner = FIN Collections
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Bankruptcy Notice Received"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Change Invoice Delivery Method To Email%2CPortal%2CUpdate Billing Info%2CUpdate Tax Exemption Status
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Change Invoice Delivery Method To Email,portal,Update Billing Info,Update Tax Exemption Status the WF sets up Case Owner = FIN Customer Mntce
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Change Invoice Delivery Method To Email"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Change Invoice Delivery Method To Portal"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Update Billing Info"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Update Tax Exemption Status") ), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Copy of Invoice or Copy of Statement
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Copy of Invoice or Copy of Statement, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Copy of Invoice or Copy of Statement"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = AR Exception, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Duplicate Invoice"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Duplicate Invoice%2CInvoice Presentation%2C Missing Payment%2C
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Duplicate Invoice Issue,Invoice Presentation Issue,Missing Payment Issue,Refund Credit Balance,Request Billing/Payment History,Request Copy Of Invoice Or Credit Memo,Request, the WF sets up Case Owner = FIN Billing.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Duplicate Invoice Issue"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Invoice Presentation Issue"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Missing Payment Issue"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Refund Credit Balance"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request Billing/Payment History"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request Copy Of Invoice Or Credit Memo"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request Order Details For Invoice"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Wrong Organization Charged"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Other") ), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Internal Email Notification
rules.description: This Workflow is used to send notification to the Sales Rep who created a case via the Billing Web Form
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Invoicing"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Invoicing Privileges, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Invoicing Privileges"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = MAD Billing, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Special Invoicing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"MAD Billing"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Manual Billing Form Submission%2CRequest To Pay By ACH
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Manual Billing Form Submission,Request To Pay By ACH, the WF sets up Case Owner = FIN Acct Mgmt.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Manual Billing Form Submission"), ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request To Pay By ACH")), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Misapplied Paymentn, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Misapplied Payment"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Missing Payment, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Missing Payment"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Other the WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Other"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Pay Invoice, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Pay Invoice"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Price, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Price"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Request Billing Docs
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Request Billing Docs WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request Billing Docs"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Request Receipt%2FOrder Detail
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Request Receipt/Order Detail the WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Request Receipt/Order Detail"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.fullName: Billing Web Request Special Invoicing Customer Issue
rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Special Invoicing Customer Issue, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Special Invoicing Customer Issue"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Vendor Forms the WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Vendor Forms"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type = Wrong Org the WF sets up Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Wrong Org"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: When Billing Web Request Type =Refund Credit Balance, the WF sets up Invoice Case Sub Type = Duplicate Invice, Case Owner = Finance COE/Billing
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Web_Request_Type__c ,"Refund Credit Balance"), CreatedBy.FirstName = "BillingRequestForm", ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web to Case"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False )

rules.description: Moves CRE cases to CCO Specialist queue
Moves CRE cases to Fin Queue

If Type = Invoice, Case status is Open, Case Subtype = AR Exception. Then assign the case to BOS Queue At day 31 of being open, the case will close. If the case is closed through this business rule, there will be an automatic notification sent to the ow
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Invoicing"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "AR Exception"), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New - Assigned"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Follow Up - New Email"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Agent Follow Up"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Sales Rep"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Sales Admin")), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c =False)

rules.description: If Type = Invoice, Case status is Open, Case Subtype = AR Exception. Then assign the case to BOS Queue At day 31 of being open, the case will close. If the case is closed through this business rule, there will be an automatic notification sent to the ow
rules.formula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Invoicing"), ISPICKVAL( Dispute_Issue__c , "AR Exception"), OwnerId = "005d0000001XNW9",
OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New - Assigned"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Follow Up - New Email"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Agent Follow Up"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Sales Rep"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "On Hold - Sales Admin")), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c =False)

rules.description: This workflow is meant to update the case to a closed status
This workflow is meant to update the case to a closed status
rules.formula:
AND(
OR( AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'AutoCloseQueue', SuppliedEmail = 'Classes-Notify@usa.redcross.org'),
Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'AutoCloseQueue' ), AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'LTP on RCO'), OR( !CONTAINS(Account.Name,'Instructors Corner Account'),ISNULL(Account.Name),ISBLANK(Account.Name)),
$Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c != True )

rules.description: Send email Alert when PO Order Denied.
rules.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Close_Reason__c ,"Customer Ineligible"), true, false)

rules.fullName: Case Follow Up - ARC Support Team
rules.description: This workflow will change the owner of the case to the Queue designated in the follow up picklist value.

rules.fullName: Case Follow Up - ARC Support Team Formula
rules.description: This workflow will change the owner of the case to the Queue designated in the follow up picklist value.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Follow_Up_Group__c, 'ARC Support Team'), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: This workflow will change the owner of the case to the Queue designated in the follow up picklist value.

rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Follow_Up_Group__c, 'CCO Specialist'), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: This workflow is to update the case with contact information to assist in the automation of OpenSpan

rules.fullName: Case Information update - contact zip Formula
rules.description: This workflow is to update the case with contact information to assist in the automation of OpenSpan
rules.formula: AND( ISBLANK(Contact_Postal_Code__c), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: When email to case comes in from the TSC scanner related to postal mail this workflow will update the case origin to "Postal Mail"
When email to case comes in from the TSC scanner related to postal mail this workflow will update the case origin to "Postal Mail"
rules.formula: AND( SuppliedEmail = 'redcross@tsc.com', $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: This workflow is to change the priority of cases that come in with the word Cancel get changed to High Priority
This workflow is to change the priority of cases that come in with the word Cancel get changed to High Priority
rules.formula: AND( OR( CONTAINS( Description , 'Cancel'), CONTAINS( Description , 'cancel'), CONTAINS( Description , 'CANCEL'), CONTAINS( Subject , 'Cancel'), CONTAINS( Subject , 'cancel'), CONTAINS( Subject , 'CANCEL'), ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c , 'Community Cancellation'), ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c , 'Cancel')), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.fullName: Case Status Changed to New Assigned
rules.description: Updates case status to New - Assigned when case is assigned to a user.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") , isChanged(OwnerId),RecordType.DeveloperName = "Service_Cases", ISPICKVAL (Type, "Invoicing"))

rules.fullName: Case Status Changed to New Assigned Formula
rules.description: Updates case status to New - Assigned when case is assigned to a user.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") , isChanged(OwnerId), AND(Latest_Queue_Owner__c != null || CreatedBy.Alias != "sauto"), ISCHANGED(LastModifiedDate), LastModifiedDate > CreatedDate, Owner:Queue.QueueName != "AutoCloseQueue", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Invoicing", ISPICKVAL (Type, "Invoicing"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False)

rules.fullName: Case Status Changed to New Assigned Formula for invoicing
rules.description: Updates case status to New - Assigned when case is assigned to a user.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") , isChanged(OwnerId), AND(Latest_Queue_Owner__c != null || CreatedBy.Alias != "sauto"), ISCHANGED(LastModifiedDate), LastModifiedDate > CreatedDate, Owner:Queue.QueueName != "AutoCloseQueue", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Invoicing", ISPICKVAL (Type, "Invoicing"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False)

rules.description: Case record has been sent to CFS
Case with High priority
Case with No priority

rules.fullName: Change Case Record Type to Sales For RSG
Change Case Record Type to Sales For RSG Formula
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( Subject , 'Community Registration Lead'), RecordType.Name = 'Service Cases', $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.fullName: Change Invoicing to Read only Invoicing
rules.description: This will change record type from Invoicing to Read only Invoicing when case is closed.
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Invoicing', IsClosed = TRUE, $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE)

rules.fullName: Change RCSPO to Read only RCSPO

rules.fullName: Copy Billing to Shipping Case Object

rules.description: Workflow to send an email to a customer when a case they have initiated has been closed

rules.fullName: Electronic Invoice Assignment for Finance Team
rules.description: Assign to finance Account Maintenance Queue based on Subject contains 'Electronic Invoice Delivery Opt In' string in it.
rules.formula: CONTAINS(Subject,'Electronic Invoice Delivery Opt In')

rules.description: This workflow rule will look to see if the case owner is a queue and based on that it will clear the value in the follow up group field.
rules.formula: CONTAINS(OwnerId,"00G")

rules.fullName: Follow Up Group - Clear Value Formula
rules.description: This workflow rule will look to see if the case owner is a queue and based on that it will clear the value in the follow up group field.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(OwnerId,"00G"), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.fullName: Handle Bounce Email case for RCS PO
rules.description: In case if the emails bounces for RCS PO, it will be automatically moved to Auto Close queue

rules.fullName: High Priority for Invoice Case Sub type

criteriaItems.value: Bad Address,Duplicate Invoice,Misapplied Payment,Missing Payment,Price,Wrong Organization

rules.description: Tag a case with Case Origin = Community if the case was created by a community user via the community
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( $User.UserType, 'Customer Portal User') || CONTAINS ($Profile.Name, 'Community')

rules.fullName: Invoicing Case Subject Field Update Formula
rules.description: This workflow will be used to update the service case subject line
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Invoicing', OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Email')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Online - LMS')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Web')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Web to Case')) ), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: Changes the record type to LTP on RCO
Changes the record type to LTP on RCO when the case is resubmitted

rules.fullName: LTP on RCO Rule For Approved Cases
rules.description: Checks the description on the LTP on RCO cases record

rules.fullName: LTP on RCO Rule For Rejected Cases
rules.description: Checks the description on the LTP on RCO cases record

rules.fullName: Last Modified Date - Is changed - Case
rules.description: This workflow will update a field with anytime the case is modified.
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISCHANGED( LastModifiedDate ), OR(ISNEW()) ) )

rules.fullName: Last Modified Date - Is changed - Case Formula
rules.description: This workflow will update a field with anytime the case is modified.
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISCHANGED( LastModifiedDate ), OR(ISNEW()) ), $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.fullName: Mark Send Survey Skipped Upon Case Close
rules.description: Wflow sends an email to contact with a link to a web survey. Wflow checks if contact on case has been sent a survey within the last X amount of hours.
rules.formula:
AND( OR(RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TD", RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TC"), IsClosed = true, PRIORVALUE(IsClosed ) = false , Contact.Hours_Since_Last_Survey_Sent__c < $Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Hours_Threshold__c ,
$Setup.ETL_Configuration__c.Is_ETL_User__c = false,
$Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Is_Closed_Case_Survey_Active__c,
$Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = false
)

rules.fullName: Move RCS PO Case to Red Cross Store
rules.description: Changes the case owner to RCS PO
This workflow will update OCR cases with correct information for agents
This workflow will update OCR cases with correct information for agents
rules.formula: AND( SuppliedEmail = 'Classes-Notify@usa.redcross.org', $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: On case create, make the subject the initial question asked
rules.formula: CONTAINS(Subject, "PHSS-IC-Question")

rules.fullName: Send Customer Email For Ready To Close Invoice Cases Formula
rules.description: Email will be sent to the contact (cusotmer )on the case for invoicing cases when case is moved to Ready to Close queue. Also when this occurs a check box "Customer Notification Sent" will be checked to indicate email has been sent out along with a timest
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type , "Invoicing"),RecordType.DeveloperName = "Invoicing", OwnerId = "00Gd0000000SdP7", PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) = "00Gd0000000SdP5", Customer_Notified_of_Resolution__c = false , $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = FALSE )

rules.description: Wflow sends an email to contact with a link to a web survey. Wflow checks if contact on case has been sent a survey within the last X amount of hours.
rules.formula: AND ( OR(RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TD", RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TC",RecordTypeId = "0120V000001pNvg",RecordTypeId = "012d0000001cm4l"), PRIORVALUE(IsClosed ) = false , IsClosed = true, OR ( Contact.Hours_Since_Last_Survey_Sent__c >= $Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Hours_Threshold__c , ISBLANK(Contact.Hours_Since_Last_Survey_Sent__c) ), $Setup.ETL_Configuration__c.Is_ETL_User__c = false, $Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Is_Closed_Case_Survey_Active__c = true, Contact.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false, $Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = false )

rules.fullName: Send Survey Upon Case Close %28for Invoicing Cases%29
rules.description: Wflow sends an email to contact with a link to a web survey. Wflow checks if contact on case has been sent a survey within the last X amount of hours.
rules.formula:
AND(
OR(RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TD", RecordTypeId = "012d000000097TC"),
PRIORVALUE(IsClosed ) = false ,
IsClosed = true,
OR ( Contact.Hours_Since_Last_Survey_Sent__c >= $Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Hours_Threshold__c ,
ISBLANK(Contact.Hours_Since_Last_Survey_Sent__c) ),
$Setup.ETL_Configuration__c.Is_ETL_User__c = false,
$Setup.Survey_Settings__c.Is_Closed_Case_Survey_Active__c = true,
Contact.HasOptedOutOfEmail = false,
ISPICKVAL( Type,"Invoicing"),
$Setup.Workflow_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = false
)
